name: 2D Shooter Game (agazis)
description:
A simple game developed in Unity simulating a 2D Space War where we only have 1 spaceship to shoot enemies and save the galaxy!

 This game consists of 5 levels where, each level has an alarmingly increasing number of enemies! Moreover, on the upper left screen there is a score and high score count! Lastly, you can pause or un-pause the game at any time (press Esc).

Enjoy!

Credits

Created by A.Gazis

Modifications:

  1. Created a complete interesting, comprehensive, and coherent level (game now has 5 levels)
  2. Added multiple additional levels and tie them in to create a logical progression in your game. (NOTE: Each level has more enemies to kill)
  3. Modified the out-of-game menus in some significant and meaningful way (deleted instructions and added more levels to the menus)
  4. Reskinned the existing graphics in some significant way, such as change the player or an enemy to a completely different character (changed icons of stationary shooter and our spaceship)
  5. Add additional significant and coherent graphical elements to the game, such as new enemies or environmental challenges, complete with animated states (added more enemies)
  6. Replace sound effects in the game to update the sound design of the game. (changed loop default mp3 track in main menu and mp3 sound of the levels.)
  7. Added images to the background
